title: Compare Cold War effects on west and east Euro

content.question:
Directions: The suggested writing and planning time for this question is 35 minutes. Make sure that you are best prepared to answer the question thoroughly in the time permitted. You should spend 5 minutes organizing or outlining your essay. In writing your essays, use specific examples to support your answer. If time permits when you finish writing, check your work.

Compare and contrast the political and economic effects of the Cold War (1945-1991) on Western Europe with the effects on Eastern Europe.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
